page.title: 10Local events and festivities
page.content: Each year in Skelton and Kirby Hill the churches hold Garden Fetes but in Skelton there is also an annual Gala which began in Jubilee Year. On Gala Day we have a show. We enter some things like handwriting and painting of a woodland scene. We enter an animal made out of vegetables. They all ge t judged and there is a Fancy Dress and a Gala Queen. There are lots of stalls and a Tombola. There are races and there is a parade down the village and a band. You can buy tea and biscuits. We have a disco at night.
